name: 2nd World Congress on Psychology & Behavioral Sciences
content: We take great pleasure in inviting participants from all over the world to attend the “World Congress on Psychology & Behavioral Sciences” scheduled during April 23-24, 2025 in Paris, France. Psychology Conference 2024 is a three days congress with the theme: “Recent Advancements and Challenges in Psychology & Behavioral Sciences” consists of an assortment of Special Keynote Sessions, Oral Presentations, Panel Discussions, Poster Presentations, Young Researcher Forums, E-Posters, Exhibitors, Questionnaires and Networking opportunities led by the most extraordinary and prestigious speakers who surpass in the fields of Psychology, Psychiatry, Behavioral Sciences, Mental Health, and Neurosciences & Neurosurgeries.
